mapper.select: SELECT c.certificate_num AS certificate_num , c.reservation_num AS reservation_num , TO_CHAR(c.certificate_date, 'YYYY-mm-dd') AS certificate_date , r.member_id AS member_id , (SELECT member_name FROM members m WHERE m.member_id = r.member_id ) AS member_name , r.doctor_id AS doctor_id , (SELECT d.doctor_name FROM doctor d WHERE r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id ) AS doctor_name , p.amount AS amount , c.description AS description , c.file_key AS file_key , f.origin_file_name AS origin_file_name , f.file_extension AS file_extension , f.file_name AS file_name , f.file_path AS file_path FROM certificate c INNER JOIN reservation r ON c.reservation_num = r.reservation_num AND c.status = 'UY' AND r.member_id = #{memberId} LEFT OUTER JOIN payments p ON p.certificate_num = c.certificate_num LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON c.file_key = f.file_key ORDER BY c.certificate_date DESC
SELECT count(*) AS count FROM certificate c WHERE status = 'UY' AND DATE(c.certificate_date) = CURDATE()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO certificate ( certificate_date , reservation_num , status , certificate_status ) VALUES ( now() , ${reservation_num} , 'UN' , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_date ,m.member_name,r.patient_comments FROM certificate c INNER JOIN reservation r ON c.reservation_num = r.reservation_num INNER JOIN members m ON r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE c.certificate_num = ${certificateNum};
